snippet.title: Shantae and the Pirate’s Curse: Official Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Available NOW for North America on 3DS 

$19.99

The final chapter in the original  Shantae story is her biggest adventure yet! When Shantae loses her genie magic, she must join forces with the nefarious pirate Risky Boots to save Sequin Land from an evil curse.   

As Shantae, explore mysterious islands, solve puzzling labyrinths, wield powerful pirate weapons, and slay monsters with Shantae’s signature hair-whip attack! Big bosses, off-beat humor, and a cast of characters both weird and wonderful as only WayForward can deliver!
